== Minalur (CT) (627781) ==

Minalur (CT) is a town in the [[Talappilly]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 4.12 sq. km. and harbouring 1522 households with total population of 6120 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 14 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 300 km. Male population is 2949 and female population is 3171. Scheduled Caste population is 522 and Scheduled Tribes population is 13. Census Location Code of the town is 627781<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class V (population_total 5,000 to 9,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 14 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 99 km. Railway station is at Mulamkunnathukavu at a distance of 4 km.
